channel.title: Imtidad Cultural Podcast
channel.itunes:subtitle: A Cultural Podcast
channel.itunes:author: Ghazi Gheblawi and Mohamed Mesrati
channel.itunes:summary: one of the first cultural Arabic podcasts focusing on English and Arabic culture and literature in Britain and the Arab World
channel.description: Imtidad a cultural show produced and hosted by Ghazi Gheblawi and Mohamed Mesrati from London focusing on literature and art
